name: B. Obtain Two Zeroes
statement:
You are given two integers a and b. You may perform any number of
operations on them (possibly zero).During each operation you should
choose any positive integer x and set a := a - x, b := b - 2x or a :=
a - 2x, b := b - x. Note that you may choose different values of x in
different operations.Is it possible to make a and b equal to 0
simultaneously?Your program should answer t independent test cases.
